means: 得体的，适宜的，合乎礼仪的

sentence.Network_en: Self-assertion was not thought seemly in a woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们认为女性不应该过于自信。

sentence.Network_en: Control yourself , sir. These outbursts of petulance are not seemly.
sentence.Network_cn: 您哪, 就克制点吧. 这么使性子可不像话.

sentence.Network_en: We no longer pay a seemly deference to our superiors.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们对长者再没有一点点推崇.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... seedling 幼苗 seemly 得体的，适宜的 seep (液体等)渗漏.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S2) ... seemliness 适当 seemly 适当的 seen 看见.
松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... garment n. 衣服, 外衣, 外表 9。 seemly adj. 适宜的 10。 saccharine adj. 糖质的, 含糖的 11。.
“红宝书”补充词汇（２） --外语频道--中国教育在线 ... scoundrel n. 坏蛋，恶棍 seemly a. 好看的, 得体的 serried a. 密集的.

list.abs: Is but the seemly raiment of my heart., 都不过是我内心的表面光彩;
I dare say it would have been more seemly to decline this proposal., 我知道更合体的作法是拒绝他的邀请.
Chewing gum on a train is not seemly in a lady ., 淑女在火车上嚼口香糖不太雅观.
seemly conduct , modesty ., 适度的举止 , 谦虚.
the betterment of the world can be accomplished through pure and goodly deeds , through commendable and seemly conduct .通过纯洁和良好的行为，以及值得赞颂和适当的品行，才能够达到世界的改进。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old Norse sæmiligr, from soemr 'fitting' (see seem)

entry.tran: 得体的;适当的;合乎礼仪的
entry.def: Seemly behaviour or dress is appropriate in the particular circumstances.

example.ex: Self-assertion was not thought seemly in a woman.
example.tran: 人们认为女性不应该过于自信。

sentences.sentence: "it is not comme il faut for a gentleman to be constantly asking for money"

auth_sentence.content: Like Bruhn, she was Nureyev's opposite: seemly, understated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Like Bruhn, she was Nureyev's opposite: seemly, understated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Like Bruhn, she was Nureyev's opposite: seemly, understated.

auth_sentence.content: I experienced joint & muscle pain seemly spurred on by immediate & severe insomnia.
auth_sentence.res_content: I experienced joint & muscle pain seemly spurred on by immediate & severe insomnia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I experienced joint & muscle pain seemly spurred on by immediate & severe insomnia.
